original_text: She could have sold it and she could have given the money to poor people. She could have sold it for more than 300 coins. A man would have to work for a year to get that much money.’ So they spoke angrily to the woman.
korean_text: 이 향유를 삼백 데나리온 이상에 팔아 가난한 자들에게 줄 수 있었겠도다 하며 그 여자를 책망하는지라

sentences.original_text: and she could have given the money to poor people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 돈을 가난한 사람들에게 줄 수 있었는데

sentences.original_text: She could have sold it for more than 300 coins
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그것을 300개 이상의 동전으로 팔 수 있었는데

sentences.original_text: A man would have to work for a year
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람은 일 년 동안 일해야 했을 것이다

sentences.original_text: So they spoke angrily to the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그 여자에게 화를 내며 말했다
